caption: Great food

We recently tried Mandarin Restaurant after several years away, and the quality was much better this time. The eggplant with garlic sauce was so silky and delicious that even the eggplant-haters complimented it. The tofu with veggies had high-quality tofu and high-quality fresh veggies. Whatever they have changed, it's great now!

Ok. So. Keeping it real. How does one know whether the Chinese restaurant you plan on ordering from is the right choice? We try it. Then, if we don't like the food we never return.  Well, stop the guess work. Order Mandarin! Anything! It's all good! Mandarin is my go to in a moment when we are hungry.
Great service. Food was prepared quickly.

The food was good, but for some reason Mandarin Restaurant charged my credit card twice for the same meal! Hopefully they'll reply to my messages and address the issue. (Also, the wait time was an hour and a half, which seems a bit long.)
Food and service was ok
Good food and prices. You have to find your own parking.
Well it was my first time ordering take out from them( shrimp fried rice) it was good. I will return.

I meet friends in this place quite a bit! This is the best place to dine.  I go to this spot many times. The cooking is great, the staff is courteous and the rates are reasonable. I like going in this place to have a good dinner.

Food IS DeLiciousLy made!!! I LOVE this PLace!!! CLean, CLean, CLean!!! I LOVE the portions. I LOVE my free soda!!! I spend approx. $30-40 each visit!!! This pLace is a GO-TO when you want AMAZINGLY GREAT FOOD!!!
Great food and pricing, friendly staff.
The place is fantastic and spacious, the food was enchanting and the rates were very inexpensive. quickly, effective service and very personal waiters. Highly recommended.
Delicious food, so enjoy
Yummy food. Friendly customer service, and they always give us extras when we order take out. So good I drive out of town to order from them.
The food is not really great the taste lts ok rice not good general chicken toss not good shrimp and veggies just 4 little shrimp I would not recommend sorry

Nice addition to Silver Spring. Food is good, service is excellent, the prices are reasonable.  Been back at least 5 times since my first order about 3- weeks ago. Thoroughly reccomend them. Orders are usually fast too! Try them out. I think you will be pleased!

I've gotten takeout from Mandarin Restaurant today, and it's awesome vegetarian Chinese food, which keeps me coming back. I picked up an order today (instead of delivery, like normal) and the people working were very genuinely friendly and kind. Can't say enough good stuff about this place!
Very good there. I order there often, the food is good, and they are very generous.
The bestest.
Pretty much your run of the mill Chinese takeout. I suspect they use the same supplier as other nearby Chinese restaurants so it will be more or less consistent with any other takeout joint.
Gave us free bepis !
I ordered General GSO Chicken. It was overcooked. Crunchy all the way through not tender. I  would not recommend this place.
Excellent food! Fast delivery, order 5 wings and fries, and a shrimp and broccoli, VERY VERY VERY GOOD!!! Very fresh! I will be ordering again!
Only for wings
Exceptional and delightful food, I liked the vibes the spot has, and the staff members were friendly. Will definitely come back again.
Mandarin Restaurant has the best Chinese food & delivery in the area they are super nice and hospitable over the phone and the delivery service is always fast and efficient.

I had been meaning to check out Mandarin before COVID-19 hit, but a pandemic won't stop this awesome restaurant. The food I ordered was fresh, the ordering process is very simple and easy and my food was prepared and arrived within only 30 mins of ordering. Glad to have such a fantastic and efficient spot so close to home.
I eat in this spot a lot since I work right next to it. I got to say their service is always fantastic and they keep the spot neat regularly. Rates are fair and they serve generous portions.

Terrible. Waited an hour no update on when food would be here. We called a women answered the phone said it was still “cooking” and it would be another 20-30min. Another hour goes by and still nothing we call again same women answers the phone and is extremely rude never apologizes for the wait and said the food was on its way. We ended up canceling in the end and will never be ordering from them again.
Great place. Had to wait once for a bit longer than normal for my takeout food, but they gave me a free drink because of it. Ordered from it twice, and they give good amounts of food and its tasty
Terrible.

Went into the restaurant for take out Saturday April 25, 2020. No one was wearing a mask , no employees. I asked if they wore masks while preparing food several times. Finally someone said yes. Did not believe them Left the store without purchasing anything. Even if they had said yes, I wouldn't buy anything as the cashier and all others were unmasked.

The eggplant in garlic sauce made my mouth hurt, because of how spicy it was. Also, the pork dumplings were not up to par. It honestly tasted like there was chicken in the dumplings, instead of pork. They did have good sesame chicken though.
Best Chinese restaurant in the DMV area. Ordered a dozen times already, it's consistently good! Try the Seafood Delight, shrimp and cashews or the sweet and sour shrimp. Delicious!

I celebrated my birthday this evening in this great place. happy to tell that it was a tremendous evening and the restaurant was definitely one of the reasons for the happy celebration. The team  helped in a lovely way, the cooking was great and my friends were so  joyful. We shall definitely visit again for more celebrations. Thank you very much.

Pros: SUPER friendly and helpful service, relatively inexpensive, very accommodating for vegans, family owned and operated. Cons: it's not very good. Everything was kinda soggy. My family seemed to enjoy the general tso's chicken. General consensus: lacking in flavor and texture
Good food
Great food, super friendly staff members, always excellent mood. They charge reasonable pricing and the food quality is fantastic. Keep up the good work.

Best Chinese food delivery in town. Everything was so much tastier than other Chinese food restaurants in Silver Spring. The dumplings and lo mein were excellent and the wonton soup was great! Delivery was easy on the Beyond menu app.
The food is so good that I eat at the restaurant every Saturday and Sunday for lunch.
Very good service & excellent food, fast service, I recommend this place...  good prices too...
Absolutely delicious and so much food. We loved the general tsos chicken... sooo crispy and tasty!
Food is so so. Very greasy. 🍤 were so hard couldn't eat them. Rice tasted dry hard and not fresh.
I have been going here for over 25 years. Good food and good service always keep me
Nice customer service, it a nice place for my co-worker retirement party.
Excellent fast service. The food is very good. A very good menu.
Great food. Good prices .friendly staff.Clean environment.
Well I ordered the chicken wing and beef and broccoli.... the chicken wings was not bad but the beef tasted like a car tire...
Chicken and garlic sauce was delicious
Delicious
Friendly staff, good portion sizes, but the veggie spring rolls are pretty bland
It was good.. Only been once so cant say to much
Exactly takeout Chinese. No frills. Good price. Good food.
Very tasty!
The dishes are small compared to other Chinese fast foods.
Yummy
The only restaurant that comes close to Chinese food in New York!!! Good meal all the time.
Had the fried crab with fried rice. Reasonable prices
Nice and fast
Didn't  care for  the food.
Vegetarian chicken and mixed veggies is amazing.
Our daughter always visits Mandarin when she visits. We usually make it a family affair. Relatively reasonable pricing.
Stopped by f for quick lunch.
Very nice costumer service, good food
Food was excellent, fast and delicious!
Friendly , good food at a good price point!
Good food. Good service.
I used to love eating that place until my friend / classmate  told me that he saw 2 rats .
Healthy food. A little dissapointed with flavoring.
Fantastic BBQ ribs, General Tso's tofu, and Ma Po tofu.
Very good beef fried rice.
Food is disgusting I ordered the wings with fried rice nasty for no reason and the wings are very small
Food is always hot and fresh, and staff is always courteous, friendly, and understanding!
Great food and kind service.

Really great lunch special (served 11 AM to 3 PM).  We ordered three takeout items: curry shrimp, pepper steak and tofu with mixed vegetable.  Each came with fried rice and a spring roll.  (The menu offered either plus a can of soda, but they gave us both since we didn't want the soda.)  Everything was well-prepared with just the right amount of spicing.  The tofu came well-dehydrated in a wonderful, thick soy sauce; this suggests that the tofu was fried very quickly at high temperature with soy sauce.  I've never seen tofu, included that which I cook myself, turn out so well.  The three meals were served in rigid (not foam) clam-shell containers that could be washed and re-used.  Total cost for pickup and before tip was $21.52. Their delivery charge would have been $1.50.
Fast delivery. Food is good I love the chicken with fries and the shrimp lo mein is the best

before they closed down i use to love this place but ever since they reopened the food has not been the same. The fried chicken is terrible the food smells weird, like old batter and mold. the french fries are hard. they need to go back to the old recipe or just don't serve certain food.
Good, cheap acceptable.   Basically a take out joint.
Great chicken wings and fried rice
Very good. Everything was fresh, had great flavor and was cooked well except for the broccoli that i ordered which was a little tough.
(Translated by Google) The food is delicious in this place  (Original) Está rica la comida en este lugar

Sick after eatting food. Rice was a little iffy. I had called in for delivery  and the driver instead of coming straight up to the suite after delivering it after my lunch break told me to go downstairs to get it from the curb. I told him I was at work and my lunch break was over. Then driver came up and went to wrong door and call me on my cell phone yelling at me to come out that he had my food and didn't want to get a ticket since it was going to be my fault. I should of listened to my co workers who vowed never to order from them again since it also had made them sick and they even told me that they serve old rice (that's how it tasted) Made me sick not even 2 hours later it sent me to the bathroom. My other co worker who ordered it lost her appetite since we got it late took it home to eat and the next day told me that it also made her sick.
Very good chicken fry ..

I ordered food from this place and it never came. I waited more than an hour and when I contacted them to receive an update on my order, they stated they assumed that I canceled it. I never called to cancel and they did not do anything to reconcile the situation. Terrible experience. I do not recommend at all. Do not go to this place.

This used to be a really good place for Chinese food.  I don't know if management has changed, but the last couple times the service and food has not been good.  Last time ordered delivery, the delivery guy was upset he didn't get tip when food was almost an hour late.  Ordered take-out today and had to wait 20 minutes.  Food was not good.  Not going to again.
Excellent Chinese food here. The chicken is awesome and the noodles very tasty and spicy. Great place if you like Chinese food!

I have been eating at mandarin for awhile now, they have really good food and it's always on point and they are very friendly she used to make me laugh and we would discuss family stuff, they give you ur food just the way you ask for it and they give u ur money worth...there food has this taste to it that's delicious and all Chinese places aren't like that I mean no matter what I get..I absolutely love there general tsos so I usually get the wings and the rice shrimp rolls beef and shrimp with broccoli all is good..
This is our go-to Chinese restaurant in Silver Spring. I love their crab rangoon and General Tso's chicken. We only do take-out or delivery.
Really bad food.... cold even if u eat there...... a bad experience
Food is alright. I got delivery. I ordered three egg rolls and they sent me one. I asked to be refunded and they didn't refund the money back. Probably won't order here again.
